section1.heading: Hotel Consulting Group
section1.text: You focus on your day-to-day business, while we bring the time, resources, and expertise to take your business to the next level.

section2.heading: Our Vision
section2.text: To revolutionise the hotel and co-living sectors through strategic consulting, efficient management approaches, and innovative operational concepts. With a deep understanding of the hospitality, serviced apartment, and co-living industries, and a holistic approach, we offer solutions that are both innovative and practical. Let us shape the future of your hotel and co-living projects together and ensure sustainable success.

section3.heading: OUR EXPERTISE AND SOLUTIONS INCLUDE
section3.subHeading: You are already familiar with the various challenges that come with managing a hotel or co-living property. We know how to overcome these challenges with tailored solutions. We offer solutions in all areas, from asset management to room pricing.
section3.text: All of our solution specialists have hands-on experience in the hotel and co-living sectors and know what is important. Thanks to our experience in development, financing, sales, and successful operation of hotel and co-living properties, we understand the perspectives of both investors and operators. Our expertise is shaped by decades of experience and the use of the latest digital features. However, what truly sets us apart is our approach to crafting and implementing tailor-made solutions for existing challenges.

section4.heading: Operators & Hoteliers
section4.subHeading: The hotel, serviced apartment, and co-living sectors face a wide range of complex and constantly changing challenges that need to be addressed.
section4.text: From the increasing competition from online platforms to the impact of the global pandemic and the rapidly evolving digital landscape, we analyse current trends and developments to help you find solutions and thrive in this highly dynamic industry.

section5.heading: Investors & Owners
section5.subHeading: We provide you with comprehensive information and services related to the exciting world of hotel and co-living investments.
section5.text: As experienced experts, we assist you in identifying lucrative investment opportunities, evaluating hotel, serviced apartment, and co-living properties, developing bespoke investment strategies, and optimising the return on your existing real estate portfolio.

section1.heading: Hotel Consulting Group
section1.text: Offers tailor-made consulting and management services to successfully realise your hotel, serviced apartment, and co-living property projects.

section2.heading: Technical Service Assistance (TSA):
paragraphs: Our years of experience in the hotel and co-living sectors have taught us that optimal planning and execution during project development are foundational to the later economic success and efficient operation of a business. From design planning to space utilisation and meeting operator requirements, ensuring the proper training of the operating team on technical systems is crucial.

details.heading: HOTEL CONSULTING GROUP's experts accompany and support you from the beginning in:
bullets: Reviewing, analysing, and evaluating site and market assessments as well as the operator's requirements
Reviewing or preparing interface lists to ensure clear transparency of the responsibilities of the construction company, owner, and operator during the project development phase
Assisting planners and architects with design, approval, and construction planning
Developing special concepts to optimise the building approval process, such as mobility concepts to optimise parking space requirements
Advising on optimal space planning and utilisation in accordance with operator requirements
Evaluating, planning, procuring, installing, and approving FF&E and OSE
Regularly participating in planning and construction meetings and conducting periodic site inspections
Advising on the planning, procurement, installation, and approval of outdoor and fa√ßade advertising systems

section3.heading: Consulting for the Hotel, Serviced Apartment, and Co-Living Sectors:
paragraphs: We are aware of the challenges you face when it comes to increasing efficiency, controlling costs, developing personnel, or adapting to changing market trends. HOTEL CONSULTING GROUP offers creative methods that provide not only short-term solutions but also ensure long-term sustainability.

All of our solution specialists have many years of experience and deep expertise in the hotel and co-living sectors, assisting you in developing strategies, optimising processes, and implementing innovative solutions and technologies. With tailored consulting services, we help you position your business successfully and sustainably, while also gaining competitive advantages.

section7.heading: Revenue Management, Distribution & E-Commerce:
paragraphs: Continuously growing revenue, targeted occupancy increases, and consistently optimising the Gross Operating Profit (GOP) are essential to ensuring your business's long-term operational efficiency and success in a dynamic and competitive market environment.

We support you with bespoke solutions to increase your revenues, improve your online presence, and strengthen your competitiveness in the market. Our clients and partners include hoteliers, operating companies, investors, banks, and financial institutions‚Äîand potentially you!

details.heading: HOTEL CONSULTING GROUP's specialists support and advise you in:
bullets: Developing revenue management strategies: We assist in creating dynamic pricing strategies to set the right prices at the right time for different room categories to maximise occupancy.
Applying yield management strategies: To maximise revenue generation, we leverage yield management techniques.
Using data analysis to predict demand: We assist in adjusting pricing strategies based on market demand forecasts using data analytics.
Optimising distribution channels: We help select and manage distribution channels to reach a broad audience, increase visibility, and boost bookings.
Implementing e-commerce solutions: We assist with setting up and optimising online booking platforms to offer a user-friendly booking experience and improve conversion rates.
Analysing market trends and competitors: We help analyse market trends, competitors, and guest data to make informed decisions that boost revenue and profitability.
Training employees: We provide training and workshops for staff to keep them up to date on the latest developments in revenue management, distribution, and e-commerce.

section8.heading: Controlling & Reporting:
paragraphs: Our professional consulting services in the area of controlling and reporting help you analyse and optimise your financial performance, identify risks and potential opportunities, and implement targeted measures. We work with you to develop bespoke controlling tools and processes tailored to the specific requirements and goals of hotels and co-living properties.

Our goal is to help you strengthen your competitiveness and ensure sustainable growth while providing you with the certainty that potential risks can be identified early on and addressed with targeted financial and operational measures.

details.heading: HOTEL CONSULTING GROUP's experts advise and support you in:
bullets: Analysing and optimising existing controlling and reporting processes: Through an in-depth analysis of current processes, weaknesses can be identified, and optimisation potential uncovered to ensure more efficient and meaningful reporting.

Defining relevant key performance indicators (KPIs): Consulting includes determining key metrics that allow you to measure and monitor financial performance, occupancy, customer satisfaction, and other key aspects of your business operations.
Budget and forecast preparation: Consulting includes the development of budgets and long-term financial plans to support financial planning and facilitate informed decision-making.

Implementing controlling tools and systems: Consulting involves the introduction of software solutions and tools to automate controlling and reporting processes, improving efficiency and providing real-time data.

Training and coaching staff as needed: Consulting services can also include training and coaching employees to improve their understanding of controlling and reporting concepts and support implementation in practice.

section9.heading: Guest Experience & Community Management:
paragraphs: Creating exceptional guest experiences and community management in the hotel and co-living sectors is crucial to crafting a unique and memorable experience for guests and fostering a strong community within the property.

We help you create unforgettable customer experiences and build an active, engaged community, enhancing your brand's positive image, achieving unique market positioning, strong guest loyalty, and a vibrant community.

paragraphs: As a project developer, you face numerous challenges in the realisation of hotel, serviced apartment, or co-living property projects. The current market situation demands a deep understanding of the constantly changing needs and expectations of target groups.
Planning and implementing sustainable concepts that are both economically and ecologically viable is more important than ever.

header.title: OUR MANAGEMENT PLATFORM - READY FOR DIGITAL OPERATIONS
paragraphs: While most operators and consultants consider their job done once they've provided theoretical recommendations, HOTEL CONSULTING GROUP offers sustainable support and operational implementation through our own management and operator platform for the hotel, serviced apartment, and co-living sectors. Our platform provides lasting assistance and operational execution of revenue optimisation and cost reduction measures across all relevant functional areas to ensure successful and sustainable operations.

Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with industry-specific know-how to provide a customised solution for your property - whether you prefer to use our operator brand or opt for white-label management. With our operator platform, you have access to a wide range of tools and functions, enabling us to manage your property efficiently and reliably in partnership. From room management to revenue management and guest communication, our platform offers everything you need for smooth operations. Our experienced management team is ready to assist with implementing the platform and developing tailored solutions to meet your specific requirements. We help you reduce operating costs, increase occupancy, and maximise guest satisfaction.

Our recommendations: Based on the results of the feasibility study, specific recommendations are developed. This can include concept adjustments, site optimisation, risk mitigation, or financing strategies.

subsections.title: b) Image and Video Data:

Event Photography and Videography: Photos or videos taken during events for documentation and promotional purposes.
User-Uploaded Media: Images or videos uploaded by users for specific functionalities (e.g., profile pictures).

subsections.title: a) General Data Processing Purposes:
items: Responding to inquiries and providing services.

subsections.title: b) Image Data Processing Purposes:
items: CCTV: Ensuring the safety and security of individuals and property.
Event Photography: Documenting and promoting events via our website, social media, or marketing materials.
User-Generated Content: Enabling user functionalities (e.g., personalized profiles or reviews).

sections.title: 5. Legal Bases for Processing
content: Legitimate Interests (Art. 6(1)(f) UK GDPR): Website operation, security (CCTV), and internal documentation.
Consent (Art. 6(1)(a) UK GDPR): Marketing communications, event photography for promotional use, and non-essential cookies.
Contractual Obligations (Art. 6(1)(b) UK GDPR): Processing necessary for fulfilling service agreements.
Legal Obligations (Art. 6(1)(c) UK GDPR): Compliance with laws or law enforcement requests.

sections.title: 6. Retention Periods
content: General Data: Retained only as long as necessary for its purpose or as required by law.
CCTV Footage: Retained for up to 7 days, unless required for legal investigations.
Event Media: Retained indefinitely for documentation and promotional use unless deletion is requested.
User-Uploaded Content: Retained until the user deletes it or deactivates their account.

sections.title: 7. Data Sharing and Transfers
content: We share data only:
With service providers (e.g., hosting platforms, payment processors) bound by data processing agreements.
With law enforcement or regulatory authorities if legally required.
For international transfers, we ensure compliance with UK GDPR through safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs).

sections.title: 8. Security Measures
content: We implement advanced security measures to protect your data, including:
Encryption of stored and transmitted data.
Access controls and regular security audits.
Secure storage solutions for sensitive data, including image data.

sections.title: 9. Rights of Data Subjects
content: Under the UK GDPR, you have the following rights:
Right to Access (Art. 15): Obtain a copy of your personal data.
Right to Rectification (Art. 16): Correct inaccuracies in your data.
Right to Erasure (Art. 17): Request deletion of your data.
Right to Restrict Processing (Art. 18): Limit the processing of your data.
Right to Data Portability (Art. 20): Receive your data in a portable format.
Right to Object (Art. 21): Object to processing for legitimate interests or marketing purposes.
Right to Withdraw Consent: If processing is based on consent, you can withdraw it at any time.
To exercise these rights, contact us at office@hotelconsulting.group .

sections.title: 10. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
content: We use cookies to enhance functionality and analyze website usage.
Essential Cookies: Required for website operation.
Analytics Cookies: Help us improve performance (requires consent).
Marketing Cookies: Used for targeted advertising (requires consent).
You can manage cookie preferences through the cookie banner.

subsections.title: a) CCTV Surveillance:
items: Retention: Data deleted after 7 days unless required for investigations.

subsections.title: b) Event Photography and Videography:
items: Purpose: Internal use, documentation, and promotional materials.
Rights: You may opt-out of photography at events or request the removal of specific images.

subsections.title: c) User-Generated Media:
items: Purpose: Enhance user functionality (e.g., profile pictures).
Retention: Stored until deleted by the user.

sections.title: 12. Complaints
sections.content: If you believe your data protection rights have been violated, you may lodge a complaint with the Information Commissioner's Office (ICO):

sections.title: 13. Updates to This Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this policy to reflect changes in our practices or legal obligations. The latest version will always be available on our website.

impressum.heading: Legal & Privacy
impressum.intro: Hotel Consulting Group Ltd. respects your privacy and is committed to ensuring the security of your personal data. Below are additional clauses specific to your services.

sections.title: 1. Data in Third-Party Contracts
content: In the process of negotiating and managing third-party contracts, we may collect and process:
Vendor and supplier details (e.g., company names, contracts, and payment terms).
Client preferences and requirements for vendor selection.
Data Sharing:
Data is shared only with pre-approved third parties, such as vendors and suppliers involved in contract negotiations.
All shared data is protected under confidentiality agreements.

sections.title: 2. Smart Technology and Data Privacy
content: When integrating smart technologies, the following data may be collected and processed:
Device Data: Data from IoT devices such as occupancy sensors, energy meters, and smart locks.
Usage Analytics: Guest and staff interaction data with smart systems (e.g., app usage).
Responsibility:
Hotel Consulting Group Ltd. ensures that all recommended technologies comply with data protection regulations (e.g., GDPR, UK GDPR).
However, the client remains responsible for the ongoing management of data collected through these systems and adherence to privacy laws.

sections.title: 3. Sustainability and Data Collection
content: For sustainability projects, we may collect data such as:
Utility usage data (e.g., electricity, water, and gas consumption).
Waste management statistics and recycling rates.
Purpose: This data is used to analyze environmental impact and develop tailored sustainability strategies.

sections.title: 4. International Data Transfers
content: For international projects, data may be transferred across borders to facilitate collaboration with stakeholders. We ensure that:
All data transfers comply with the UK GDPR, GDPR, or other applicable data protection regulations.
Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) or equivalent safeguards are implemented for transfers outside the UK/EU.

sections.title: 5. Sustainability and Green Practices Clause
content: Hotel Consulting Group Ltd. is dedicated to fostering sustainable practices in the hospitality industry. Our sustainability services may include:
Recommending eco-certified vendors and suppliers.
Designing waste reduction programs and energy-efficient solutions.
Conducting carbon footprint assessments.
Disclaimer: While we provide frameworks and recommendations for sustainability, results depend on the client's commitment to implementation and adherence to best practices.

sections.title: 6. Cybersecurity in Smart Technology Systems
content: For projects involving IoT and smart systems, we recommend cybersecurity audits to identify vulnerabilities. Hotel Consulting Group Ltd. provides guidance but is not liable for breaches resulting from third-party technology providers.
